name: Shift3 Technologies
description:
Shift3 Technologies is a Software-Development-as-a-Service firm created with the perfect blend of high-business acumen, deep technical expertise and an innovative operating model that enables us to deliver world-class projects at a tremendous value, within California and beyond.
We provide essential professional services for enterprise systems: automation, expansion, integration, upgrading and installation. Additionally, we produce an array of highly configurable commercial off-the-shelf products with a focus on user experience.
Our expertise in custom business application development could include any variation of website design, software integration and modernization, quality assurance, staffing augmentation or rescue operations.
Our Software-Development-as-a-Service strategy empowers our clients to rapidly deploy key resources across consulting, project management and software engineering at scale to tackle mission critical projects both large and small.
